Font usage

Example

Fonts being used 'Roboto' for all body text and 'FontAwesome' for icons.

Body font family with fall-backs..

body { font-family: Roboto,"Helvetica Neue",Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif; font-size: 16px; font-weight: normal; }
